title: x/mobile/androidstudio: imported and not used compile error
body:
I am newbie in Go on this moment, but I have problem which takes me about a week, and I don't make any progress. I build and run "Hello Gopher" on my phone, but when I would to try to that same with "basic script", I get errors. To today I know compilator not allow to stay in code imported things which are not used, but in this script wasn't imports like in error. I write there, becouse I could not to find anywhere solve of this problem by one week, and maybe that, can be not my fault.
I use gcc: MinGW, AndroidStudio 1.2.2, Windows 8.0, Go 1.5.1
Here is error:
http://pastebin.com/Cguaebny
,hello.go:
http://pastebin.com/PPCn6sPE
,MainActivity:
http://pastebin.com/61f8pSSb
,hello gradle:
http://pastebin.com/cGnZ4Ak2
,and My project is in folder:
C:\gowork\src\golang.org\x\mobile\example\bind

I thought give everything which is needed, if anybody can help, Thanks in approve.
